name: Grilled Cuban Mojo Pork Chops
description: Transport your taste buds to Cuba! In Cuban cooking, “mojo” refers to any sauce made with garlic, olive oil, and citrus juice. While bitter orange juice is traditionally used, we’ve included lime juice & orange peel in our blend to help achieve that authentic flavour. All you need to do is add your favourite OJ and oil to create a tangy and flavourful marinade that’s perfect for grilling. Don’t let the recipe time scare you away–marinades and meal prep go hand in hand. Marinate protein ahead as you prep for the week. When it’s time to grill, you’ll have dinner on the table in 20 min!
preparation: In Round or Multipurpose Steamer, whisk together marinade mix, juice, and oil.
Add pork to steamer; flip to coat. Cover; marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Discard marinade.
Preheat grill to medium-high. Lightly brush grill with oil to prevent sticking.
Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner. Place pork on pan and head to the grill.
Grill pork, with lid closed, 15–16 min, until cooked through and lightly charred, flipping every 4 min.
Remove Sheet Pan Liner from pan. Place pork on Sheet Pan. Drizzle with additional freshly prepared marinade, if desired.
tips: This marinade works with pulp or pulp-free orange juice.

Make use of the Sheet Pan and Sheet Pan Liner when heading to the grill. Place uncooked meat on the liner; remove liner once food hits the grill and use the Sheet Pan as a clean, food-safe tray to bring cooked food back inside or to the table.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup rice and 1 cup grilled veggies.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
